title: S12 Ep95: Ghosts: The Invisible Epidemic of Possession
itunes:title: Ghosts: The Invisible Epidemic of Possession
description:
Exorcist, Robert Major joins us to discuss a disturbing and growing trend of spiritual possession ghostly interference that is disrupting the lives of the living in terrifying and unusual ways.

Website: https://ghostremover.com/
